skills.skill: Technical Skills in Vacuum Deposition/ Thermal/ Laser/ Wetline/ Automation/ Adhesive/ Welding/ Material Handling/ Robotics/ Vision Systems/ PLC Programming

duties_responsibilities.duty: Install and qualify new process equipment and troubleshoot day-to-day manufacturing issues on the production line.
Solve day-to-day production, equipment, and process problems.
Conduct planned process experiments, collect and analyze data, and report experimental results.
Interface with internal associates and supplier representatives to complete assigned projects.
Maintain effective communication with production associates and engineering technicians.
Identify and implement yield and product performance improvements.
Develop and provide training to engineering technicians and production associates.
Develop and maintain drawings, process specifications, and standard operating procedures.
Adhere to all safety procedures and good housekeeping standards.

education_certification.credential: Associate’s Degree in an engineering or similar technical discipline combined with 3 or more years of technical work experience in a Manufacturing setting, or Bachelor’s Degree, Master’s Degree, or Ph.D. in an engineering or similar technical discipline with no experience required. Technical work experience in combination with a degree is preferred.
